author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Four! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Who doesn't love a plucky band of space-smugglers taking jobs, carving out a dubiously ethical and sometimes "doing a little good to do a little bad" life on the edge of space? Morgue Stars is a procedurally generated Stats-light but story-heavy card and dice driven game. Let's dive in!

Check out the Rulebook HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/en/product/509751/morgue-stars-2nd-edition?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 044 - MORGUE STARS by Alessandro Montoro

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The THIRD Season of Blood Bowl is upon us with a brand new starter set, two new sprues for Bretonnians and Tomb Kings and a pair of Spike Magazines in support. Let's check out the new team that comes in the starter, the long awaited Knights and Squires of the Bretonnians! 

Thanks to Games Workshop for the boxes and books to review!
#adwip 
#bloodbowl
#warhammercommunity 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

GMG T-Shirts and Hoodies HERE: https://shop.spreadshirt.ca/guerrilla
title: GMG Reviews - SPIKE 19 - The Bretonnians by Games Workshop
